Great fun game. More of a thriller than horror. Recent patches have made the game more balanced, and I hope they continue in the path they are going!

(look at edit to see review for 2021, and check comments to enjoy salty players trying really hard not to call me the f-word but failing)

It's the only and best asymmetrical horror game (except for maybe white noise 2, please check it out if you really enjoy being scared). 

Killers in this game are a little underpowered after a survivor player becomes more experienced, so the developers recently buffed the killers and nerfed a couple of survivor's perks. That's why the reviews right now are mixed. Don't worry, people will come around and accept that having a scary killer is better than a wimp killer. Enjoy the game!

2021 edit: The previous words were written in mid 2018, but I need to change my review to not recommended. 

The devs release broken and unfinished content, then do not finish fixing it, instead releasing patches that "fix" old bugs and introduce new and unexpected ones. The issues I had with the game two years ago are still here (underpowered killers and overall awful game balance). All community feedback is ignored, except now the devs brazenly express their contempt of the playerbase when the community "badgers" them for quality of life changes. The devs priorities are mostly backwards, focusing on animations, cosmetics, and graphics, instead of on improving gameplay. 

The game is also full of funny little guys that lose really badly against you, then look for your dbd review to comment on it, likely because they enjoy making others laugh. Please, take some time to enjoy some of their comments below.

マッチングをなんとか調整しようとする姿勢は最近見せていますが、それに反比例して無限ロードからの少人数ゲームがあまりにも頻発していて今の状態ではとてもおすすめできません。

게임자체는 재미있는데 진입장벽이 높습니다. 초보자를위한 장치로 튜토리얼을 추가한건 잘했다고 생각하지만 그래도 부족하다고 생각됩니다. 유튜브로 잘하는사람 못하는사람 그저 그런사람영상들을 보시고 구매를 결정하길 추천드립니다. 퍽이라고 불리는 스킬?들을 활용하시려면 게임내 재화를 벌어야하는데 그사이에 고통받을수있습니다. 그것을 감안하고도 사신다면 추천드립니다.

Когда-то, а именно до нового обновления, игра была довольно неплохой. НО С ВЫХОДОМ НОВОГО ОБНОВЛЕНИЯ 2.10 игра пошла ко дну. Спринт полностью убили, как и другие перки с усталостью. Фонари теперь бесполезны для спасения игроков, ведь убийцы поднимают сюрвов слишком быстро, я уже молчу про перк, который ускоряет это действие.. С полу-работающими палетками ещё можно смириться, но а как убегать? В 80% муняки выигрывают. Ведь сюрв не всегда успевает добежать до новой палетки или окна. Я уже молчу про бедных 20. 
Отыграв с новой обновой за муняк и сюрвов, я убедилась, что баланс сейчас на стороне убийц. Определённо, некоторых муняк нужно было улучшить, но не до такой степени, что теперь трапы хитуют. АЛЛО. 
Игра за выживших превратилась в игру за люк. Найди и свали, ведь хрен ты спасешь других. Это стиль крысы. ~ От хороших убийц убежать ещё тяжелее. с: 
Играя за убийцу, я даже не напрягалась, я уже молчу про ОЧЕНЬ РЕДКИЕ аддоны, которые максимально упрощают игру, ведь сюрв с усталостью, которая не регенится, легкая добыча. 
Что ж... Игра превратилась в помойку. На данном этапе развития, не советую покупать.

Most people who are crying over the recent killer buffs have only played the game in the last year or don't even play killer at all. These were all needed changes and the game is more accessible to new players and more fun for veteran players then ever before.

Fun game, the only downside i had was around rank 17-15 was when i encountered a lot of Survivor with friends that would circle me like a shark with flashlights for 10-15 minutes, but the game is still worth the buy. survivor and killer are both exciting and fun to play, you can be casual or extremely competitive, an all-around good time. the game is in a somewhat of a good spot right now. where they're figuring out how to balance perks and add-ons. a good time to buy and a great time to play.
Zevkli ama üst üste oynanmıyor sıkmaya başlıyor.

Game is going in a good direction, most of the negative reviews are because of the nerf to survivors that came in the 2.1.0 patch, it used to be where it was nearly impossible to win as killer without camping/tunneling the survivor(s). they have taken most of that power away now, but they still have a lot of power in their hands such as sprint burst, decisive strike (might be changed), dead hard etc. In my opinion the game is a lot more balanced than it was before and now you kind of have a chance of winning as killer without camping/tunneling. (I play 50/50 survivor and killer, I know both sides)

EDIT: Well god damn, behaviour did it again and made it impossible to win with killer without being lame and camping/tunneling, came back after a break and I did not have fun on Killer or Survivor, Survivor is just braindead easy with boons, and killer is just either incredibly boring if your playing to win by proxy camping/tunneling, or just flat out not fun if you play fair because you get stomped, at this moment I don't recommend DBD, at least in the state it is in, check back in a couple of months and if it still doggy doo-doo then, IDK.

EDIT  2: it ok :)
Goodbye  DBD .

Very enjoyable game, currently being unfairly downrated by people wanting unwilling to learn how to adapt.

So I recommend not listening to any of the negative reviews around July 25-30th 2018. 

Game had a pretty large balance update and rather than people actually try to learn to strategies on how to play the game or to do certain things differently they are just going to Review bomb the game and make it seems like its a horrible game now.

The game is a ton of fun, and yes Killers have gotten a lot stronger since the last patch. But if you go and watch any high tier Survivor or killer play this game they will say its fine. Personally I've had very little problem surviving games if I do things right. Its just now I went from a 90% survival rate to about a 60% survival rate. Still means I survive more than not surviving. But I actually have to significantly try now.

The problem that all the people who are QQ over the patch have is they are too used to just easily surviving a match and now that is no longer the case.

I deffinitely recommend this game its a ton of fun especially with friends. Just dont listen to the QQers in the reviews and go watch good players play this game.
如果是萌新打算入坑那就算了，这款游戏对萌新不太友好，改动了疲劳机制后，基本上就是各种翻车，整天制作组不考虑优化游戏，一直就是在削人类，这下好了，要么人类速修电机，修好了，屠夫没有游戏体验，修不好，人类全部完蛋，人类不管是专心修机也好还是专心上树也好，游戏体验极差！许多bug特别是卡房的bug，卡输入法的bug这特么都多少年了，就这么难修复？
我收回我原来的评测好吧，我发现这游戏是真j8辣鸡，弄一些没用的东西，最主要的什么初始化错误也不给个明确的方案都没用，老子连续好几天登不上去心态炸了，这bug不修复吃屎啦
作为一个萌新，我感觉屠夫的配件好变态，人类原先的红齿轮也改了，技能也变得辣鸡，一直听人说在削弱人类，还改了疲劳，真不知道咋玩，刚入坑的我就退坑，妈的还不能给退钱，这游戏改的真der
The game is getting more and more balanced. Keep up the good work devs!

Before you get discouraged that "killers are op" and "this game is ruined" from all the negative reviews, you need to understand the killers have been and are still underpowered (Besides 1 of those killers but thats besides the point). The reason all these people are saying "killers op" is because they arent used to killer being powerful, which is what it should have been from the beginning, since in an asymmetrical game, there will be a lone power role and a group of weaker roles who must used their combined effort to take down the power role. And even then, killers are still relatively underpowered, because there are many easy ways to waste the killers time, which the killer has very little of. Oh, and  did i mention that, even now, if all the survivors play perfectly, there is literally nothing any killer, besides the Nurse, can do to win? Survivors are still strong but now that the balance gap is closing you see many salty survivor mains that are mad that they aren't are powerful as they used to be, even though they are still on top. But whichever side you decides to play, both are very fun, and something worth checking out.

This is such a great game, I got it some time shortly after it released and played intermittently up until a couple months ago in which I have been playing regularly since!

It does have a lot of flaws and has always had rough times but honestly this is one of the best games I have ever purchased, loads of fun with friends and there is still more content planned in the future!

If you see tons of negative reviews please, PLEASE do your research and see the root cause of it. I'm not going to dispute anyones gripes with the game, everyone can have their opinions but I urge potential buyers to just skim through and see if it's a valid reason not to buy it for them!

I have been playing this game for about a month now, and it is highly addictive. I prefer the killer side, but playing survivor is fun as well, and helps me become a better killer ;). Take any review you read complaining about balance with a grain of salt -- any game is going to need to continuously adjust as they both add more content to make the game more interesting and tweak things here and there.

There aren't many games like this on the market right now -- the closest I've found has been the Friday the 13th game, and I haven't tried that yet so I can't really compare. But I actually love it. It's tense, it's fun, and you can play with your friends or queue solo and have (in my opinion) just as much fun.

Other reviews mention a toxic community. I haven't noticed it that much; there are a few survivors who like to tease you when you mess up, but that happens in literally every pvp game I've ever played. If you don't like the player comments at the end of a game, you can always close the chat box, but in general I don't think it's been an issue. 

All in all, it is a great game and I'm very happy with my purchase :).
Killer biased dev's nerfed survivors into the ground. Not fun to play survivor anymore, game last lost it's fun factor. Too bad, it was a great game. -Rep for the devs

Поясню, о чём я.В этот день вышло обновление, поставившее все точки над и.Вместо того, что бы как то апнуть или помочь сурвам, которые просто молили о апдейте, потому что они были беспомощны, ОНИ ПРОСТО БЕРУТ И АПАЮТ МНОГИХ МАНОВ, ПОД ПРЕДЛОГОМ "ДЛЯ БАЛАНСА". 
Ну вот вы и получили свой баланс.В 90% каток маньяк убивает всех четверых, в 9% оставшийся сурв сбегает в люк, и 1%-любой другой исход.
Если бы меня спросили, стоит ли покупать эту игру до июля 2018 года, я бы однозначно ответил ДА, СТОИТ.

02/09/2021
UI changes are controversial in every game that has them, but this over-the-top unnecessary bloat on the new UI has zero tactical advantage for a better experience and removes information you previously had. The new running animations are not just visually inferior, they're a legitimate mechanical nerf to dodging and juking the killer. DO NOT SUPPORT ANY DLC OR COSMETICS UNTIL THE PLAYER COMMUNITY IS HEARD!!

01/05/2021
Both survivor and killer balance reined in by the devs. Generator speed vs killer pressure feels right. Constant stream of content. There is some progression bloat that needs to be updated. Some glaring bugs and memory leaks but pretty minor overall.

10/16/2019
The game is a 4v1 and when a player DCs, it's devastating on the balance of the match for both sides. It's so overrun with DCing and various forms of griefing/exploiting that the game's community is extremely toxic. Until BVHR punishes these players, I don't recommend buying Dead by Daylight. BVHR is prioritizing a constant stream of DLC and cosmetics every 3 months over fixing DCs and other glaring issues, bugs, and exploits. Don't support game companies like BVHR.

I love this game, I've played it so much it's the 2nd most played game of mine. Sure, it is a bit rough around the spots, but the devs are constantly working on improving things and listening to the community. It has a long way to go, but it has also come a long way since it was released.

Highly recommend it if you are into survival multiplayer games. Fun game to play with your friends or even make new friends. Just remember, it's just a game. Relax and have fun!

Un gran juego, vicioso, divertido y mucho que hacer, ya que tienes que subir de nivel a los personajes, sean asesinos o supervivientes, sinceramente es una joya, pro lo unico malo de este es su comunidad: toxica (no todos), anfitriones (asesinos) que tiran del cable y se va la partida, pero eso no es problema del juego, se recomienda tener paciencia al jugarlo ya que hay un diverso tiempo de espera para que se reunan los supervivientes.

Most balanced the game has ever been.  The pros of the game are that it's fun, lobbies are usually pretty fast, and it's pretty unique.  The cons are that the community is pretty toxic, there's a fair bit of grinding for the good perks (however only 2 or 3 of the meta perks are on dlcs that you HAVE to pay for and even then there's always the shrine) Overall I've put over 500 hours into the game and I still enjoy it so there's no way I could not recommend it.

This is a fantastic game. I picked it up mostly to fill the void in my heart that my one true love (Evolve) left when 2K savagely murdered it. 

I was blown away by how engaging the game is, despite how simple the premise is. Killers are fun and unique, and there's plenty of ways to play. Survivor is currently very strong (the large volume of negative reviews recently is because they took some minor nerfs, and apparently balancing the game so the power role (Killer) is actually strong is too much to ask) but can still be difficult to play. The controls are easy, but practice and experience really is the difference-maker in most cases. 

The community can be a little toxic at times (see the current reviewbombing, the Nightmare on Elm Street reviewbombing, the OchiDO temporary ban reviewbombing, or just post-game chat screenshots). It can be a little discouraging at time to new players, because some experienced players like to prowl the lower ranks in hopes of pubstomping new players. Just try to ignore them. They exist in every game. Over time, you learn to appreciate salt as an indicator that you're doing something right. 

The grind can be a little overwhelming, but it's not that bad. As you get the ball rolling it gets easier.

One more thing, people in this game complain a LOT. More than any game (includes LoL, Dota, CSGO, every toxic cesspit ever, etc) but there can be some good people out there. I've friended a lot of chill people through this game.

PS, don't trust negative reviews of people with less than 50 hours.

UPDATE: This is now an all-time favorite game. The grind seems bad at first, but it doesn't really stay that way. The game is a little more balanced now. It still has some way to go, but it's moving in the right direction. SWF (survive with friends) offers the easiest gameplay experience for survivors (by giving an unfair information advantage), but admittedly it is fun for most players, because you know you won't get screwed by a rando that has no idea what they're doing. 

9/10 game.

Игра хорошая, без сомнений, но последнее обновление просто её убило. Сломаны доски, слишком быстрая анимация поднятия Сурва, в следствие чего невозможно теперь пользоваться фонарями (МОЖНО ТУПО ХОдИТЬ ПЯРМ ЗА МАНОМ, И ПОЛУЧАТЬ ХИТЫ ---> УМИРАТЬ ОТ ТУПОСТИ РАЗРАБОВ). Невозможно пользоваться перками, связанными с усталостью, ибо во время бега теперь оно не восстанавливалось. В общем, ни ногой в эту игру, ибо она теперь неиграбельна (Тупо баффнули МАНОВ), сурвами нереально выжить. Не рекомендую к покупке, только если уж сиииильно хочется. (RIP дбд)

Game is a lot of fun, even better with friends to play with.
it's nice
This game is a ton of fun to play. Ignore all the recent negative reviews because they come from salty survivors not liking a recent patch.

A lot of other reviews out there right now are focusing on their ability to win or lose a match and their opinion on what the game balance should be. The reality of it is that this game is fun, especially if you don't listen to the vast toxic community. The game delivers on several horror genres and brings them to life. It provides countless hours of intense and most importantly FUN horror gameplay. Highly recommended for both killers and survivors!

They keep nerfing Survivors who is actually not the "Press M1 when I'm close to you" role while campers still have hook vacuum, can camp you from the beginning of the game, get buffed every patch just because some killer mains are whining, flashlight saves are close to impossible now, Nurse is still broken as fuck and high rank games are just controlled by Nurses who 4K every game.

Last patch was fine, I don't know why they needed to nerf survivors even more.

这次更新我觉得制作组的方针还是想要把游戏放在恐怖游戏这个定位，但是我个人认为人屠对抗还是游戏真正吸引人的点。
1.我觉得就算恐怖的东西见多了也不会再被吓到，制作者有点良心，总是要留住老玩家的吧，恐怖因素只能吓到那些萌新，对于老玩家恐怖游戏这个定位似乎不是很合适吧。
2.现在这个版本对人对屠夫其实都不是很好，先往下看，人无限疲劳-没法直接转点 —翻板子——板子（现在板子还有多少？）没了——被砍，人被虐成这个样子，不至于再去找虐，就是躲猫猫加速修。到屠夫这边，反正我玩屠夫没有那种找人的心态，我是被恶心到了一把游戏3转血衣黑妹咬根 安抚生灵 羽毛 暴走族 还有个紫雾，我游戏结束我没看见过黑妹，遇到好几次找不到人，心态就炸了，感觉就是人屠相互伤害，玩的根本不舒服，没有以前那种感觉玩的舒服。
3.也许被人遛5台机的屠夫，被屠夫吊起来砍的人，那时没有什么游戏体验，心里很气，但我觉得更多的人不是弃坑，而是看视频加上自己磨炼，等到自己也会玩的时候，第一次弄死4个，第一次遛屠夫成功，那时心里一定很愉快。
4.我反正建议把无限疲劳改回来，屠夫抱人也改回来，然后制作组好好整治下BUG，1开局只能蹲其他什么都不能干2打击的BUG，别老是出新衣服想着赚钱。
我真心希望这个游戏不要变味，这儿留着我们与我们的朋友愉快玩乐的记忆，我不希望这个记忆只能变成曾经来回首品味。
Now i can finally play out my killer dreams, without it being illegal.

Dont let all of the salty survivor mains fool you. The majority of the negative reviews over the last few days are because the developers are finally starting to balance the game, and they dont like that they have to actually try now. This is a fun game, and its moving in a good direction. Dont let people who are unwilling to learn deter you from trying this game.

A good asymmetrical multiplayer game with a somewhat toxic playerbase divided to survivor and killer mains. We like to cry and review bomb the game as a knee-jerk reaction to devs nerfing strong meta perks. That's how we show our maturity as players.

This recent patch nerfed a few survivor perks, and buffed previously relatively underpowered killers (Trapper, Hag). It additionally brought many previously worthless perks up to a much more usable level. The only reason I am posting this review is to counteract a lot of the review bombing, as it doesn't "ruin" the game or anything like that. Apparently this happened before too with Freddy, and then Freddy was nerfed into being even more garbage simply because people refused to adapt to a changing meta.
A stagnant meta isn't exactly the most entertaining thing, so I am glad for these changes.
pretty good job

this game have much more bugs than all others normal games... we need more patch...FIX THE PROBLEMS

I cannot recommend this to anyone because of its completely unbalanced nature. The devs and map designers have no idea what they're doing, they're listening to the wrong people crying (the bad players) and will likely never manage to balance it. It feels like an incomplete idea and is just aggravating and saddening. The "power role" has no power, it's balanced on a 1v1 level (and good survivors can easily 1v1 most killers) despite it being 4v1, the survivors completely dictate the pace of the game, and the only way for the killer to progress 90% of the time is if survivors mess up in some way.

Update;

The devs have proved themselves inept time and time again with non-stop bugs, and awful decisions that make it entirely unbalanced, and borderline unplayable. But hey at least they're getting that sweet DLC money right? They are slowing killing a game that could have been so much better in order to satisfy the worst players, leaving the top ranks a total mess. You can get better at the game, you can't downgrade, meaning that past a certain point it becomes completely lopsided. 
"Just play another game" - well, they've already told people what to do, so why not indulge them in that?

Very sad about the new patch, I understand this is a 1v4 game, but continue nerfing survivor really wasn't a good move at all. This makes survivor unplayable, expetially when you start the game with the killer

Very much enjoying the latest patch. Unloved killers given a major boost, bad perks being significantly improved to make the perk meta more interesting, and the balance between killers and survivors is probably as good as it's ever been. Game has improved significantly since BHVR took full control and am looking forward to what they have in store for the future.

Highly recommended.

40小时萌新。对着款游戏有着非常的喜爱，虽然经常上树看风景，或者说被喂个红苹果吃。。。（明明都是18级你凭什么有传承高配还烧的起苹果！气愤.jpg）。也是经常看视频集锦之类的，学波技术，但是差距好大！他们都是：好这个地方绕三圈，我们转下一个点。那里有板子，可以贪一圈，然后转点。哎，假装一个博尔特，骗一刀，转点。然而我却是：WOC前面那个地方有个窗！啊！痛！WOC这个屠夫怎么知道我要干啥？！！啊！痛！WOC那个是传说中的无敌点！哎哎哎？？！！啊！痛！然后快乐的在树上看着慈祥的屠夫对着你微笑（mmp）幸幸苦苦点出来的35级传承弹射，一刀削= =holy shit！（虽然别的人物血网还没有碰到过这个技能）也就玩白妹可以多活两秒钟（开心）黑妹是真的黑，我决定要当一名菇皇！！！（然而还是自不量力的想去救人，矛盾.jpg）可惜周围同学不玩这个游戏。唉。（不然自定义道具随便免TMD费体验！我TMD就可以喂他们吃苹果了！）
改动很令人难受，但是我还很新，我觉得我还可以抢救一下。（QTE模拟器了解一下？？？）
（ps：kingkongTV可以看杀机直播，萌新们啊，一起来学技术吧！推荐巨色和付导，B站有视频可以看，不过目前没有看到有改版后的）
所以。。。要加个好友一起来嘛？？？
（吐槽！杨教授、一阶段迈叔、蹲下的小猪佩奇、梦境弱者、98K兔妈、真可怕！突然受伤或者尖叫或者出现吓半死系列！）

Dead by Daylight wygląda jak typowy survival horror. Jednak nic bardziej mylnego! Jest to tytuł warty zakupu, ponieważ nie jest to ten typ gry, który znudzi nam się po 20 minutach.
Wcielamy się w jednego z 4 ocalałych, którzy dzięki sile współpracy muszą przeżyć. W tym miejscu wkracza zabójca, którego celem jest... zabijanie. Wow. W rozgrywce zmierzymy się z prawdziwymi, myślącymi graczami, co dodaje pikanterii i potrafi sprawić, że rozgrywka staje się nieprzewidywalna.
Zasady są całkiem proste, a szczególnie jasne po przejściu samouczka. Ocalali muszą naprawić kilka generatorów aby otworzyć bramę wyjściową. Zabójca ma za zadanie im w tym przeszkodzić. Jedyne co musi zrobić, to złapać ich i powiesić na haku, aby uzyskać sympatię „Bytu” - istoty, ucieleśnienia zła, która panuje nad tym swego rodzaju uniwersum, w którym gra ma miejsce. 
Mimo tej prostoty Dead by Daylight zachwyca swoim klimatem, świetnym wykonaniem map, postaciami i ich umiejętnościami, które niemalże idealne wpasowują się w miejsce akcji. Podczas naszej przygody mamy nawet możliwość walki jako znane postacie z klasycznych horrorów jak na przykład Freddy Krueger. Nie zabraknie również oryginalnych charakterów, takich jak: Trapper, zastawiający wszędzie pułapki na niedźwiedzie czy Widmo, który potrafi stać się niewidzialny. Każdy powinien znaleźć coś dla siebie i zapewniam, rzadko wystąpią sytuacje gdy będziemy się nudzić.
Jednakże, im bardziej wciągamy się w grę, tym łatwiej zauważamy jej wady. Tytuł niestety cierpi na brak odpowiedniego balansu. Wbrew pozorom, nie na korzyść  zabójców, a ich ofiar, czyli ocalałych. Balans w tej grze doprowadza wręcz do momentów, gdzie ci którzy powinni być słabsi, mogą wręcz dokuczać ich oprawcy. Na wyższych rangach osoby które preferują granie mordercami wręcz są zmuszeni do grania określonymi postaciami, tylko po to aby mieć chociaż cień szansy na wygraną.
Jednakże uważam, że ta gra ma potencjał na bycie bardziej zbalansowaną do tego stopnia, że przeżyje jeszcze przez kilka następnych lat. 
Na końcu wspomnę o zapewne jednej z lepszych możliwości, jaką jest gra ze znajomymi. Po zebraniu się w grupę pięcioosobową, lub, co ciekawsze, można grać mniejszą liczbą (Gra dostosowuje liczbę generatorów do liczby graczy), a nawet doprowadzić do sytuacji jeden na jednego. Możliwość zagrania w horror ze swoimi znajomymi sprawia niesamowitą frajdę po obu stronach.
Fun game, as long as you don't get triggered easily.

Update 04 / 2021 

Dead by Daylight hat immer noch zwei schwerwiegende Probleme:
- Tryhard Survive with Friends
- Rundenzeit zu kurz

Das wirkt sich massiv auf das Gameplay aus und macht es manchmal als Killer schwer für alle eine gute Spielrunde zu bieten. Leider hat es das Team bisher nicht geschafft diese zwei Probleme kreativ zu beseitigen. Von Seiten der Community gibt es sicherlich hierzu genug und auch gute Vorschläge.

Andererseits finde ich hat sich Vieles verbessert, grafisch und auch das neue HUD finde ich persönlich sehr gut. Trotz inzwischen vieler kosmetischer Produkte gibt es keinen direkten Zwang oder Vorteil.

Neues Kapitel "All-Kill":
Ich bin kein Fan von Anime oder Manga und sicher auch kein Experte - aber es wirkte alles irgendwie "Fehl am Platze". Im Nachgang muss ich aber sagen, dass der neue Killer zwar nicht sehr stark ist, aber er wirklich ganz nette Mechaniken hat. Er spielt sich sehr flüssig und die Soundeffekte sind wirklich gut gelungen.
Pretty good job so far...
Best survival horror game you would ever play.

Am Anfang fand ich das Spiel sehr interessant, und es machte teillweise Spaß, obwohl wir es mittlerweile "Bug by Daylight" nannten. Aber seit einiger Zeit wird es immer schlechter. Alle Verbesserungen dienen nur den Killern. Aber jetzt nach dem letzten Update ist das Spiel zum K*****!!!!!!! Es sei denn man spielt einen Killer z.B. den Billy. Dazu nehme man den Perk Tüftler und BBQ & Chili. Allein schon mit diesen Perks ist der Killer op. Aber soll ich Euch was sagen? Als Killer findet man kaum noch schnell eine Lobby, da kein Survivor mehr BOCK hat auf die gottverdammte S******. Man startet in einer Runde und man ist so gut wie tot. Man kann nur hoffen, dass der Killer einen nicht findet. Oh ich vergaß, mit BBQ & Chili weiß der Killer sowieso wo alle Survivor sind, wenn er jemanden hängt. Es ist echt schade um die Zeit und um das Geld, welches man investiert hat. Ich werde das Spiel nicht mehr spielen, bis die Macher endlich mal klar sehen und das Spiel wieder ausgleichen.
Thanks devs! Killers really needed these changes, don't be intimidated by the review bombing, these rank 20's who are saying they're done will be back in a month!
